sentence: • Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB ) faced a $15 billion lawsuit on Friday from its subscribers.

The complaint filed on 17 May in a Federal Court at San Jose, California, accuses the company of infringing on users' privacy by tracking their Internet usage
• Hibbett Sports, Inc. (NASDAQ: HIBB ) posted first quarter earnings per share of $0.98, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.92
• Autodesk, Inc. (NASDAQ: ADSK ) reported first quarter earnings per share of $0.37, missing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.39
• salesforce.com, inc. (NYSE: CRM ) reported a loss of 2 cents per share compared to the Zacks Consensus Estimate that the company would reporting break even figures
• The Gap Inc. (NYSE: GPS ) posted first quarter earnings per share of $0.47, surpassing the Zacks Consensus Estimate of $0.46 by a penny
